status_des.DELIVERED_TO_SENDER: Order is returned back to the shipper
status_des.TICKET_CREATED: Your order is created, Bosta will pick it up once your shipper is ready

PACKAGE_RECEIVED.bosta: Order is received at Bosta warehouses and being processed.
PACKAGE_RECEIVED.Haram Hub: Order is received at Bosta warehouses and being processed.
PACKAGE_RECEIVED.FM & Reverse Hub: Order is canceled and it will be returned back to the shipper
PACKAGE_RECEIVED.default: Order is received at Bosta warehouses and being processed.

status_des.IN_TRANSIT: Order is being transferred to Bosta's Hubs.

WAITING_FOR_CUSTOMER_ACTION.Postponed - the customer requested postp: Order is rescheduled since you postponed delivery to another date
Order is rescheduled as you were not reachable on the phone
WAITING_FOR_CUSTOMER_ACTION.Retry delivery - the customer is not in: Order is rescheduled since Bosta courier was unable to find you in the address at the delivery time
WAITING_FOR_CUSTOMER_ACTION.default: Order is rescheduled since you postponed delivery to another date

status_des.NOT_YET_SHIPPED: Order is being prepared for return to the shipper
